title: CNN
summary: The Cable News Network (CNN) is a multinational news-based pay television channel headquartered in Atlanta, United States.[2][3][4] It is owned by CNN Worldwide, a unit of the WarnerMedia News & Sports division of AT&T's WarnerMedia.[5] It was founded in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner and Reese Schonfeld as a 24-hour cable news channel.[6][7][8] Upon its launch in 1980, CNN was the first television channel to provide 24-hour news coverage,[9] and was the first all-news television channel in the United States.[10]
